transform.h
Go to the documentation of this file.
1 /*
2  * \file transform.h
3  *
4  * Stateful transformation of Cartesian coordinates.
5  * Includes capability of generating random transformations.
6  */
7 
8 #ifndef TRANSFORM_H_
9 #define TRANSFORM_H_
10 #include <random>
11 #include <stdexcept>
12 
13 #include "libmolgrid/libmolgrid.h"
14 #include "libmolgrid/quaternion.h"
15 #include "libmolgrid/grid.h"
16 #include "libmolgrid/example.h"
17 
18 namespace libmolgrid {
19 
26 class Transform {
27  Quaternion Q; //rotation
28  float3 center; //center of rotation
29  float3 translate; //amount to move after rotation
30 
31  public:
32  Transform() {
33  center = make_float3(0, 0, 0);
34  translate = make_float3(0, 0, 0);
35  }
36 
37  Transform(const Quaternion& q,
38  float3 c = make_float3(0, 0, 0),
39  float3 t = make_float3(0, 0, 0))
40  : Q(q), center(c), translate(t) {
41  }
42 
43  /* \brief Create random transform.
44  * @param[in] c Center of rotation
45  * @param[in] random_translate Amount (+/-) to randomly translte
46  * @param[in] random_rotate If true, apply random rotation
47  */
48  Transform(float3 c, float random_translate = 0.0, bool random_rotate = false);
49 
50  /* \brief Apply 3D transformation on CPU. It is safe to transform
51  * a grid in-place.
52  *
53  * @param[in] in Nx3 input grid
54  * @param[out] out Nx3 output grid (will be overwritten)
55  * @param[in] dotranslate if false only a rotation around the origin is applied.
56  * (This is for vector quantities such as gradients and normals).
57  */
58  template <typename Dtype>
59  void forward(const Grid<Dtype, 2, false>& in, Grid<Dtype, 2, false>& out, bool dotranslate=true) const;
60 
61  /* \brief Apply 3D transformation to Example. It is safe to transform in-place
62  *
63  * @param[in] input example
64  * @param[out] output example with same dimensions
65  * @param[in] dotranslate if false only a rotation around the origin is applied.
66  * (This is for vector quantities such as gradients and normals).
67  */
68  void forward(const Example& in, Example& out, bool dotranslate=true) const;
69 
70  /* \brief Apply 3D transformation to CoordinateSet. It is safe to transform in-place
71  *
72  * @param[in] input coords
73  * @param[out] output coords with same dimensions
74  * @param[in] dotranslate if false only a rotation around the origin is applied.
75  * (This is for vector quantities such as gradients and normals).
76  */
77  void forward(const CoordinateSet& in, CoordinateSet& out, bool dotranslate=true) const;
78 
79  /* \brief Apply 3D transformation on GPU. Same requirements as CPU version.
80  */
81  template <typename Dtype>
82  __host__ void forward(const Grid<Dtype, 2, true>& in, Grid<Dtype, 2, true>& out, bool dotranslate=true) const;
83 
84  /* \brief Apply inverse of 3D transformation on CPU.
85  * @param[in] in Nx3 input grid
86  * @param[out] out Nx3 output grid (will be overwritten)
87  * @param[in] dotranslate if false only the inverse rotation is applied
88  */
89  template <typename Dtype>
90  void backward(const Grid<Dtype, 2, false>& in, Grid<Dtype, 2, false>& out, bool dotranslate=true) const;
91 
92  /* \brief Apply 3D transformation on GPU. Same requirements as CPU version.
93  */
94  template <typename Dtype>
95  __host__ void backward(const Grid<Dtype, 2, true>& in, Grid<Dtype, 2, true>& out, bool dotranslate=true) const;
96 
97  const Quaternion& get_quaternion() const { return Q; }
98  float3 get_rotation_center() const { return center; }
99  float3 get_translation() const { return translate; }
100 
101  void set_quaternion(const Quaternion& q) { Q = q; }
102  void set_rotation_center(float3 c) { center = c; }
103  void set_translation(float3 t) { translate = t; }
104 
106  bool is_identity() const {
107  return Q == Quaternion() && translate.x == 0 && translate.y == 0 && translate.z == 0;
108  }
109 
110  private:
111 
112  // Sanity check grid dimensions and throw exceptions if they are wrong
113  template <typename Dtype, bool isCUDA>
114  void checkGrids(const Grid<Dtype, 2, isCUDA>& in, const Grid<Dtype, 2, isCUDA>& out) const {
115  if(in.dimension(0) != out.dimension(0)) {
116  throw std::invalid_argument("Different dimensions and input and output coordinates grids.");
117  }
118  if(in.dimension(1) != 3) {
119  throw std::invalid_argument("Input coordinates wrong dimension.");
120  }
121  if(out.dimension(1) != 3) {
122  throw std::invalid_argument("Output coordinates are wrong dimension.");
123  }
124  if(in.data() == nullptr) {
125  throw std::invalid_argument("Input coordinates missing memory");
126  }
127  if(out.data() == nullptr) {
128  throw std::invalid_argument("Output coordinates missing memory");
129  }
130  }
131 
132 
133 };
134 
135 
136 } /* namespace libmolgrid */
137 
138 #endif /* TRANSFORM_H_ */
